subject: Blanket Announcement:  I've posted files.  ;-)
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
Rather than generating a gazillion separate notifications, I figured I would do this one single 
announcement stating that I have posted a couple examples in each of my subfolders.  There 
are two different types of ITC, and various EVP (MiniBox, manual radio sweep, traditional, 
Portuguese crowd babble, etc.)  The files are pretty small, so I'm not hogging up a lot space.

I always enjoy listening to and seeing other people's examples.  I'm hoping others might 
enjoy some of my examples as well, especially my water video ITC results (which as far as I 
know, I was the first to come up with this technique).  Other people have tried it and gotten 
really good results, so if you're looking for something new and fun to try, please give it a 
whirl.  

I really appreciate all the inspiration I've gotten from others.  I'm trying to give back a little.  

:0)  Margaret
